es.title: Los miembros de Wyndham Rewards ahorran
es.description: Disfruta de ahorros en nuestra Mejor Tarifa Disponible en miles de hoteles Wyndham Rewards alrededor del mundo con la Tarifa de Recompensa.

en.title: Spa & Beauty Salon
en.description: Enjoy a wonderful massage or a rejuvenating facial at the spa. Hair, manicure and pedicure services are also available in the beauty salon.

en.title: Gym
en.description: Keep your workout routine at our cutting-edge gym or practice your moves on our tennis court.
